name: cococo - connect colour combinations
description:
COCOCO - the colourful and modern  connect-colour-combinations-game

Find and combine the right shapes with each other.  But keep in mind that you only have a limited line-length.

This game is very pleasing to the eye and ear with its modern, colourful design and cheerful music.

We hope you enjoy our game! :)

_____

This is our, Laras and Barbaras, participation for the WannaxYam Game Jam 2022.
